code: import React,{Component,useEffect}from"react";import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import Section1 from"./Section1";import Section2 from"./Section2";import Section4 from"./Section4";import Section5 from"./Section5";import Section6 from"./Section6";import Footer from"./Footer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{pathname}=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{window.scrollTo(0,0);$(".cursor").css("border","1px solid black");},[pathname]);useEffect(()=>{$(".Section4 .div1").bind("mouseleave",function(e){$(".cursor").css("border","1px solid black");});$(".Section4 .div1").bind("mouseenter",function(e){$(".cursor").css("border","1px solid white");});$(".footer").bind("mouseenter",function(e){$(".cursor").css("border","1px solid white");});$(".footer").bind("mouseleave",function(e){$(".cursor").css("border","1px solid black");});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section1,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section2,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section6,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section5,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section4,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Home;
